title: The Silver brumby : bravery in the bush (PC & Mac)
subject_group: Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Wildlife conservation
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Interactive media
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Multimedia systems
description: Minimum system requirements for PC: Pentium 100Mhz or better, 16MB of RAM, 256 VGA graphics, Windows compatible 16 bit sound card, 14" monitor set to 256 colours. MAC: Power PC 100 Mhz or better, 16MB of RAM, Sound Manager 3.0, 14" monitor set to 256 colours. From the classic Australian feature film, videos and TV series based on the much loved novels by Elyne Mitchell comes this new CD ROM. Untamed by man and unbroken in spirit, the Silver Brumby captures all the drama and spirit of Australian animals in their natural habitat, while teaching children about the importance of protecting our wildlife and assisting reading and comprehension skills. This CD ROM features 20 beautifully illustrated storybook pages, with several alternate conclusions, as well as 8 fun and challenging puzzles to solve. Suitable for ages 3-8.
